title: Parental challenge - Does your child have COVID-19, flu, cold or something else?
description: We're entering flu season. Kids will get sick just like they always have, but this year is different since we're also contending with the coronavirus.
cleaned_text: If you have reached this screen, your current device or browser is unable to access the full Edward-Elmhurst Health Web site.
